briefTitle: ALK21-010: Long-term Safety of Medisorb® Naltrexone (VIVITROL®) in Alcohol-dependent Adults
officialTitle: A Multi-Center Extension of Alkermes' Study ALK21-003-EXT (NCT01218971) to Evaluate the Long-Term Safety of Medisorb® Naltrexone
summary: This was a Phase 3, multi-center extension of Alkermes' Study ALK21-003EXT (NCT01218971) to further assess the long-term safety of repeat monthly doses of Medisorb® naltrexone (VIVITROL®).

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Participants Reporting at Least 1 Treatment-emergent Adverse Event (TEAE)
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: Up to 3.5 years of monthly treatment
